data.comment: Today's referee, Anderson Daronco, has blown to start the match.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Santos.
In the minute 1, Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Santos.
In the minute 3, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Santos.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 7, Anderson Daronco signals a Santos throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 9, Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Fluminense drives forward and Luccas Claro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick Santos.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Santos close to the penalty box.
Anderson Daronco blows against Fluminense's Caio Paulista for offside.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 15, Fluminense have a dangerous throw-in.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Fluminense are pushing forward but Michel Araujo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Santos have a goal kick.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Santos.
In the minute 18, Fluminense to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Anderson Daronco signals a throw-in for Fluminense, close to Santos's area.
Fluminense pushes forward through Hudson, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Santos at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 21, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Anderson Daronco awards Santos a goal kick.
In Rio de Janeiro Fluminense drive forward through Caio Paulista. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 23, Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Michel Araujo (Fluminense) has received a first yellow card.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Fluminense push forward at Estadio do Maracana and Michel Araujo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Santos defence.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
In the minute 28, Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Goal! A Luccas Claro header gives Fluminense a 1-0 lead in Rio de Janeiro.
Fred instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 30, Anderson Daronco awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Santos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
Corner awarded to Santos.
In the minute 32, Santos have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Santos attack but Lucas Verissimo's header doesn't find the target.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 33, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Danilo Barcelos is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Marinho levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 36, That's a fine assist from Madson.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 37, Fluminense's Danilo Barcelos is back in action after a slight knock.
Marinho of Santos is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Fluminense in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 39, Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Fluminense will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Santos.
At Estadio do Maracana, Dodi for the home team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
In the minute 41, Important block from the Fluminense defence as Felipe Jonatan fires in a strike for Santos.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 44, In Rio de Janeiro, Caio Paulista of Fluminense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Santos's Marinho is whistled for offside at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 45, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Fluminense.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Fluminense are coming forward and Danilo Barcelos gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 45, Anderson Daronco awards Santos a goal kick.
Throw-in for Santos in the half of Fluminense.
Santos drive forward but Marinho is judged offside.
In the minute 45, Anderson Daronco blows to end the first-half.
Marcos Paulo is replacing Nene for the home team.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Santos.
Santos make their first substitution with Arthur Gomes replacing Laercio Solda.
Michel Araujo (Fluminense) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Attention is being given to Santos’s Joao Paulo and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Joao Paulo returns to the field for Santos after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 49, Fred for the home team is judged to be offside.
Fluminense's Dodi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 50, Anderson Daronco awards the away team a throw-in.
Marinho of Santos gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 53, Free kick in a good position for Fluminense!
Goal! Fluminense take a 2-1 lead through a well-placed header from Nino.
Felipe Jonatan (Santos) has received a yellow card from Anderson Daronco.
In the minute 58, Santos have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 60, Can Fluminense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santos's half?
The home team replace Caio Paulista with Ganso.
At Estadio do Maracana, Hudson has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 62, The away team have replaced Lucas Braga with Angelo Santos. This is the second substitution made today by Cuca.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
Alison is on a sub for Jobson for Santos.
In the minute 65, Fluminense have a goal kick.
Santos's Diego Pituca gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 67, Free kick Fluminense.
Anderson Daronco waits before resuming play because Luccas Claro for Fluminense is still down.
Luccas Claro is back on his feet again.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Santos.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Arthur Gomes for Santos has been booked by Anderson Daronco and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Santos to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, Fluminense have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Felipe Jonatan (Santos) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Santos at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 77, Anderson Daronco signals a Fluminense throw-in in Santos's half.
Marcos Leonardo is replacing Alison for the away team.
Free kick Fluminense.
Luan Peres is booked for the away team.
In the minute 79, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santos's Marinho misses with an attempt on goal.
Anderson Daronco awards Fluminense a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Santos.
Fluminense's Fred is on target but unsuccessful.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
In the minute 86, Santos have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jean Mota is on a sub for Felipe Jonatan for Santos.
Corner awarded to Santos.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Santos needs to be cautious. Fluminense have an attacking throw-in.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Santos.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Santos.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Anderson Daronco blows to end the match. The final score is 3-1.
Fluminense's Fred has been booked in Rio de Janeiro and will miss the next match through suspension.
Yuri Lima is replacing Fred for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Fluminense take a comfortable 3-1 lead thanks to Marcos Paulo.
Ganso with an assist there.
Yeferson Soteldo (Santos) has received a yellow card from Anderson Daronco.
